channel.title: Nets's Code Help
channel.description:
Hello. I am owner/hoster/coder of the wonderful private server Ancientscape. I think I can consider myself as a intermediate coder as my server usually has 30-60 people on it at average. If you have any errors or questions considering private server coding, you can post here. I will try to answer everybody's questions but if I can't please don't be mad as no one is perfect. If I am unable to answer your question for any reason (me being offline, me not knowing it, etc.) then please refer to Darth Afro's or Mod Taharik's help threads.
Post on. ;)
[glow=red,2,300]My help status:[/glow] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img] [i]Online[/i]

item.title: Nets's Code Help
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

1993ownage:

COULD YOU TELL EM HOW TO MAKE SAFE ZONES ON A PK SERVERS I WANT EDGEVILLE BANK A SAFEZONE?

Search a tutorial on it search for

‘making safe zones in testscape’

Read full topic

item.title: Nets's Code Help
item.dc:creator: @Baros_Rocks Baros Rocks
item.description:
@Baros_Rocks wrote:

Can you make me a code that goes as follows.

Whenever someone in any shape or form “logs out” (including disconnecting). That they get instantly kicked.

Why? because, on my server when someone “logs out”. The server thinks they’re still logged in and they get an error saying your account is already logged in.

Read full topic
